OpForSpecList.description: The Archon has recognized this pilot as a famed killer of FedRats. Gain reputation with the Lyrans from contracts against the Federated Suns, and receive 10% off in Lyran stores.
The First Prince has recognized this pilot as a famed killer of Lyran scum. Gain reputation with the FedSuns from contracts against the Lyran Alliance, and receive 10% off in Davion stores.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Free Worlds League: SAFEty Isn't Guaranteed
OpForSpecList.description: This pilot has made a name for themselves against the self-righteous FWL and Knights of the Inner Sphere. Gain reputation with the Marian Hegemony and the Circinus Federation from contracts against the Free Worlds League.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Draconis Combine: The Way of Bushido
OpForSpecList.description: The Coordinator himself has begrudgingly recognized this pilot's martial prowess. Lose less reputation when taking contracts against the Draconis Combine and get 10% better selling prices in their stores.
Nobody likes Capellans. Gain reputation with the other four Great Houses when taking contracts against the Capellan Confederation.
Nobody likes paying their HPG bills. Gain reputation with all five Great Houses when taking contracts against ComStar.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Magistracy Of Canopus: Breaking the Trinity
OpForSpecList.description: Some very interesting 'toys' tend to fall off the back of Canopian trucks. Take a 10% discount when buying and get 10% better prices when selling at the black market.
This pilot has made some connections with factions that are sick of hearing Taurians harp on about 'freedom'. Get a ¢10000 cash bounty for every Taurian or Calderon unit the company destroys.

The only thing worse than slavers are slavers wearing leather skirts pretending to be the salvation of civilization. Get bonus reputation with ComStar and your employer when taking contracts against the Marian Hegemony.

Some folks are just born to be in chains. Get bonus reputation with the Tortuga Dominions when taking contracts against the Outworlds Alliance and get 12% better prices when selling in Tortugan stores.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Free Rasalhague Republic: Give Us Back Our Worlds
OpForSpecList.description: About the only thing the Lyrans and the Kuritans agree on is that the Free Rasalhague Republic shouldn't exist. Gain reputation with the Combine and the Lyran Alliance when taking contracts against the FRR.

Kamea is nothing but an entitled brat throwing a temper tantrum because she lost her palace. The local governments of the Reach will pay you a cash bonus for contracts against the Aurigan Restoration.
Kamea is a beacon of hope for the oppressed peoples of the Reach. Gain bonus reputation with the Restoration when taking contracts against the Directorate and bonus cash for kills against them.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Rim Collection: Amaris or Am I Wrong
OpForSpecList.description: The remnants of the Rim Worlds Republic are not to be trusted, even 300 years later. Gain reputation with ComStar when taking contracts against the Rim Collection and a 10% discount from ComStar stores.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Circinus Federation: Order To the Chaos
OpForSpecList.description: This pilot has taken to bringing some order to the chaos of the anti-spinward Periphery. Gain reputation with the FWL when taking contracts against the Circinus Federation. Also get a 10% discount in stores belonging to the Marian Hegemony.
Someone clever once said piracy doesn't pay. Piracy might not, but bounties sure do. Gain bonus cash when taking contracts against the Tortuga Dominions.
Someone clever once said piracy doesn't pay. Piracy might not, but bounties sure do. Gain bonus cash when taking contracts against the Aurigan Pirates and a ¢2500 cash bounty for every pirate killed.
Rule 125: You can't make a deal if you're dead. Get a 25% discount when buying from the Hanseatic League.
Rule 125: You can't make a deal if you're dead. Get a 20% discount when buying from the JarnFolk and a 10% discount from the Lyrans.

The awful thing about the Chainelane Isles is the constant chaos and infighting. The great thing about the Chainelane Isles is the constant chaos and infighting. Get 10% better prices when buying and selling in the Chainelane Isles. Also get bonus reputation from the Chainelane Isles when fighting the Chainelane Isles.

Local governments are shortsighted, greedy, and frequently need to be reigned in. Gain extra reputation with your employer when taking contracts against the Locals if your employer is also the system owner.
This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Wolf, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Dog Catcher
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Wolf, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Dog Catcher Damage
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Wolf, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

OpForSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Jade Falcon, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Jade Falcon, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Turkey Season Damage
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Jade Falcon, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Clan Ghost Bear: Loaded For Bear
OpForSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Ghost Bear, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Loaded For Bear
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Ghost Bear, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Loaded For Bear Damage
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Ghost Bear, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

OpForSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Nova Cat, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Bad Trip
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Nova Cat, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Bad Trip Damage
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Nova Cat, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Clan Snow Raven: Unkindness of Ravens
OpForSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Snow Raven, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Unkindness of Ravens
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Snow Raven, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Unkindness of Ravens
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Snow Raven, and does 5% increased damage to all Clan forces.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Dark Caste: Once a Pirate, Always a Pirate
OpForSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Dark Caste and even though they're Clanners, they're also pirates. Gain 15% bonus cash from your employer when fighting the Dark Caste as well as a 1500 cash bounty per kill.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: St. Ives: Gonna Give Them The St. Ives Blues
OpForSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting St. Ives and House Liao likes that. Each successful contract against St. Ives gives bonus Liao reputation and better discounts in Liao stores.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Word of Blake: Damn Toaster Worshipers
OpForSpecList.description: The Word of Blake is weird and worships toasters, screw those guys. Gain reputation with four of the Great Houses when taking contracts against The Word of Blake (House Marik likes them).

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Lothian League: Kicking Them While They're Down
OpForSpecList.description: This pilot likes beating on the downtrodden. Each successful contract against the Lothian League gives bonus reputation with the Marian Hegemony and gain a 15% discount in Marian Hegemony stores.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Illyrian Palatinate: I Can't Believe It's Not Slavery!
OpForSpecList.description: This pilot has decided the Marian Hegemony was right and the Illyrians make good slaves. Each successful contract against the Illyrian Palatinate gives bonus reputation with the Marian Hegemony and gain a 15% discount in Marian Hegemony stores.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Fronc Reaches: Give Us Our Worlds Back
OpForSpecList.description: The Fronc Reaches might not be hurting anyone but that doesn't mean the Taurians and Canopians aren't mad about losing their colonies in the region. Gain bonus reputation with the Taurian Concordat and the Magistracy of Canopus for each successful contract against the Fronc Reaches.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Mercenaries: It's Not Personal, It's Just Business
OpForSpecList.description: Nothin' personal, kid, it's just business. Gain bonus reputation with the Mercenary Review Board for your professionalism when fighting Mercenaries as well as 10% bonus cash from your employer.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Sanctuary Alliance: Invaders From Beyond Time And Space
OpForSpecList.description: Who are they? Where do they come from? Literally no one knows. However, we do know that the Taurians hate them and pay a healthy bounty for killing them. Gain bonus reputation with the Taurian Concordat when fighting the Sanctuary Alliance as well as a ¢5000 bonus per kill.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Dane Sacellum: Playing The Fiddle While Rome Burns
OpForSpecList.description: The Daners claim their religion descends from ancient Rome so let's show them what happened to ancient Rome. Gain bonus reputation with the Mallard Republic and the Jacobson Haven when fighting the Dane Sacellum.

The Haven is really just a haven for criminals and black markets and we don't cotton to that around these parts. Gain a ¢10000 bonus for each kill when fighting the Jacobson Haven as the other Sanctuary Worlds powers appreciate your efforts.

The Mallard Republic is mired in paperwork to a ridiculous degree and literally everyone hates dealing with them because of it. Gain bonus reputation with their enemies, the Dane Sacellum and the Jacobson Haven, when fighting the Mallard Republic thanks to making them suffer with more paperwork.

MissionSpecList.MissionSpecName: Simple Battle: They Were Coming Right At Me!
MissionSpecList.description: This pilot enjoys a straight-up fight and has +3 accuracy during Simple Battle contracts.

Description.Name: Accuracy Increased
Description.Details: This pilot enjoys a straight-up fight and has +3 accuracy during Simple Battle contracts.

MissionSpecList.description: Other forces in Three-Way Battles deal 10% increased damage to each other.

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at escorting other units and keeping them out of harm's way. Allies take 15% less damage.

Description.Name: Damage Resistance
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert as escorting other units and keeping them out of harms way. Allies take 15% less damage.

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot deals 25% extra damage to vehicles during Ambush Convoy missions.

Description.Name: Convoy Ambush Damage
Description.Details: This pilot deals 25% extra damage to vehicles during Ambush Convoy missions.

MissionSpecList.MissionSpecName: Target Acquisition: Welcome to the Race Track
MissionSpecList.description: This pilot is extra speedy when it counts. 60 meters added to walk/run/jump distance during Target Acquisition contracts.

Description.Name: Boosted Speed
Description.Details: This pilot is extra speedy when it counts. 60 meters added to walk/run distance during Target Acquisition contracts.

Description.Name: Boosted Jump
Description.Details: This pilot is extra speedy when it counts. 60 meters added to jump distance during Target Acquisition contracts.

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot is extra speedy when it counts. 60 meters added to walk/run/jump distance during Rescue/Recovery contracts.

Description.Name: Boosted Jump

MissionSpecList.description: They didn't used to pay us enough for this. Well... now they do.

OpForDefaultList.description: This pilot inflicts increased damage against {faction}.

Description.Name: Increased Damage
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at killing the target faction, and deals 10% increased damage to them.

Description.Name: Increased Damage
Description.Details: This pilot inflicts 10% damage against the target faction.

OpForDefaultList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting {faction}, and takes decreased damage from them.

Description.Name: Increased Damage
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the target faction, and takes 10% decreased damage from them.

Description.Name: Damage Resist
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the target faction, and takes 10% decreased damage from them.

MissionDefaultList.description: This pilot deals 10% increased damage during {contract} contracts.

Description.Name: Damage Resistance

StratComs.description: The commander is sitting this contract out, providing strategic command over the battle. Resolve generation is increased for all units by +2.
